## Loading the TenX brain data
    
```{r, load-libs, message=FALSE}
library(TENxBrainData)
library(pryr)
library(microbenchmark)
```

```{r, load-data, message=FALSE}
tenx <- TENxBrainData()
dim(tenx)
```

```{r, select-subset}
tenx.sub <- tenx[,1:13000]
system.time(tenx.inmem <- as.matrix(counts(tenx.sub[,1:13000])))
object_size(tenx.sub)
object_size(tenx.inmem)
```

## Calculating column sums

```{r, save-results}
system.time(res1 <- colSums(counts(tenx.sub)))
save(res1, file = "/media/Storage/Work/TENxBenchmarking/res1.rda")
```

```{r, colSums}
bm1 <- microbenchmark(colSums(counts(tenx.sub)),
                colSums(tenx.inmem), 
               times = 5L, unit = "s",
               control = list(order = "block", warmup = 0))
bm1$expr <- rep(c("naive", "in_mem"), each = 5)
save(bm1, file = "/media/Storage/Work/TENxBenchmarking/bm1.rda")
bm1
```
